root.name: Kabuki Warriors
root.description: OverviewKabuki Warriors is a fighting game featuring sword battles between two teams. Money is earned from fighting and is used for travel, eventually enabling the player to tackle to final match in Kyoto. Through this main tour mode, new warriors can be acquired in order to improve the player's team.Kabuki Warriors is one of the most widely critically panned games in history. It remains the only game to have received a 'one out of ten' from the industry magazine Edge.
